footer.text: Character Guide â€¢ Build: Wanderer | Update Date: 02/06/2024 | Editor: ._.samantha._.

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Tulaytullah's Remembrance__ 
Wanderer can utilize the passive really well, able to fully utilize the attack speed and attack buffs.

__Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds__ 
A good stat stick and decent synergy.

__Flowing Purity__
Best craftable option, especially with HP changes.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Widsith__ 
One of his best weapons, a bit of RNG but can out damage most 5-Star options.

__Solar Pearl, Skyward Atlas, Cashflow Supervision, Kagura's Verity, Memory of Dust__ 
Statsticks that may have useless or difficult-to-use synergy.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> ATK%|<goblet> Anemo DMG Bonus%|<circlet> CRIT DMG or CRIT Rate

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Normal Attack: Yuuban Meigen
**2)** Elemental Skill: Song of the Wind
**3)** Elemental Burst:  Five Ceremonial Plays

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
If utilizing a shield, __Retracing Bolide__ will perform better than a 2-piece combination of sets.
Also, __Viridescent Venerer__ performs at similar levels to a 2-piece combination of sets.

__Marechaussee Hunter__ is a set only viable with Furina.
